    • Constructor Detail

      • BotBase

        public BotBase​(java.net.InetAddress remoteAddress,
               int remotePort,
               java.util.regex.Pattern prefixPattern)
        Extends the Client constructor, adding the prefix this bot expects before messages.
        Parameters:
        remoteAddress - The address of the server.
        remotePort - The port to connect to. (Server needs to be actively listening for connections on this port)
        prefixPattern - The prefix which should be used when communicating with this bot.

    • Method Detail

      • RemoveDisplayName

        public java.lang.String RemoveDisplayName​(java.lang.String contents)
        Removes the display name attached to the front of a given string, if one exists.
        Parameters:
        contents - The string to remove the name from.
        Returns:
        A copy of contents with the display name removed.

      • GetDisplayName

        public java.lang.String GetDisplayName​(java.lang.String contents)
        Gets the first ocuring display name from a given string.
        Parameters:
        contents - String to check.
        Returns:
        The first ocuring display name.

      • RemoveChatPrefix

        public java.lang.String RemoveChatPrefix​(java.lang.String contents)
        Removes the prefix from a given string, if it is present.
        Parameters:
        contents - String to remove the prefix from.
        Returns:
        A copy of contents without the prefix at the start.

      • IsPrefix

        public boolean IsPrefix​(java.lang.String str)
        Checks if a given string matches the prefix pattern.
        Parameters:
        str - The string to check.
        Returns:
        Whether the given string is the prefix.

      • RemoveANSIEscapeCodes

        public java.lang.String RemoveANSIEscapeCodes​(java.lang.String message)
        Removes ANSI escape codes from a given message.
        Parameters:
        message - The message to remove the codes from.
        Returns:
        A copy of message without any escape codes.
